attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: That the Government should introduce legilslation which would bring into being the total ban on the sale of life like imitations of all type of hand held firearms.

rejection.details: The title must be a call for action and not your name. A similar petition also exists  http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Replica-Gun-Ban/
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
